outline:
1. to incite, impel, make willing
    1. (Qal) to incite, impel
    2. (Hithpael)
      1. to volunteer
      2. to offer free-will offerings
kjv_def: offer freely, be (give, make, offer self) willing(-ly).
strongs_def: to impel; hence, to volunteer (as a soldier), to present spontaneously
